text: TV2/Nord is one of TV 2's eight regional services. The service's headquarters are in Aabybro although it has had previous offices in Frederikshavn, Hjørring and Hobro. The station broadcasts news and other content. It broadcasts to people in the northern part of Jutland, Greenland and in the Faroe Islands. Content is also produced by TV2/Nord. ==See also== * TV 2 ==References== ==External links== * TV2/Nord Official Site Category:Television stations in Denmark Category:Television channels and stations established in 1989 Category:Mass media in Aabybro
title: TV2/Nord
